name: Lever Interactive
tagline: The premier independent digital marketing agency.
description:
Lever Interactive is the premier independent digital marketing agency, specializing in performance-based marketing management. Lever Interactive combines the experience of seasoned search and digital marketing professionals with the latest in advertising technologies. Services include pay-per-click advertising, search engine optimization (SEO), social media marketing, web analytics, display advertising, web design and mobile marketing.
With over 10 years of direct and interactive marketing know-how, our team at Lever Interactive provides leading expertise in todayâ€™s most advanced digital marketing opportunities. We'll be the smartest agency decision you ever make.
